title: 家又被烧了，魂淡啊，这回用的是羊毛
author: xtzxtz
txt_content:
未命名.jpg (191.06 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2011-8-2 23:26 上传




我就是像照亮点，结果用了地狱岩加火但是用玻璃罩上了旁边的羊毛居然起火了，气死偶列

replies.author: dreamsun
replies.txt_content: 樓主的頭像沒有幫你滅火.........真可惜......

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
你這樣放玻璃, 火花還是會冒出來... 
側視:
[blank][glass][blank]
[glass][fire][glass]
[blank][bloodstone][blank]
上視:
[blank][glass][blank]
[glass][fire][glass]
[blank][glass][blank]


你試試底下的放法...
側視:
[glass][glass][glass]
[glass][fire][glass]
[glass][bloodstone][glass]
上視:
[glass][glass][glass]
[glass][fire][glass]
[glass][glass][glass]

replies.author: xtzxtz
replies.txt_content: 感谢，咳咳⑨如果上去的话不会灭火只会化掉

replies.author: moneyho9
replies.txt_content: 不要因为省玻璃而这样子摆

replies.author: xtzxtz
replies.txt_content: 好吧，修正完毕，不过在玩tnt箭的时候不知道发射器射TNT箭只往下射，导致家向下两米

replies.author: HelloBeauty
replies.txt_content: 火和火把亮度是一样的。。。。

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content:
HelloBeauty 发表于 2011-8-5 10:38 
火和火把亮度是一样的。。。。
火把的亮度是14 火是15

replies.author: howard
replies.txt_content:
⑨的功力還不夠呀.....
只能夠滅火把=W=

replies.author: xtzxtz
replies.txt_content: 明明是⑨碰见火就会化掉
